name: Evil Justice: The First Case
description:
In the Kingdom of Evil, justice is hard to come by.

Reporter Millicent Scourge was having a relaxing day until she discovered her friend was killed, and his death was being blamed on an innocent.

Driven by the need to reveal the truth, she plunges into the Kingdom's one-sided justice system, and fights against the might of the Law.

The Basics

Your goal is to reveal the truth of the incident. The gameplay is based on Phoenix Wright's courtroom battles (since they're not making more games, I gave up and made my own). This complete first case takes a little over an hour to play to the end.

Content warning:

Lots of blood (for effect), and a few poorly drawn bugs and spiders.

Message From the Author

Releasing a game publicly is a new experience for me. I hope I'm doing it right.

I made this case on my own with no budget. I want to make lots more cases right away (and I'm working on several right now), but I'm checking to see whether there are essential improvements I should add before going full steam ahead.

I could release future cases episodically, or in a complete package of six- I haven't decided yet. I should probably charge for the next cases, but they should be pretty cheap, and this first case will always be free standalone.

Please contact me at deeborm@gmail.com or elsewhere if you have any feedback, critique, comments, or suggestions.

Have an evil day!
